featured.text: Every good Swiss citizen had a knife in his pocket.
In Switzerland, there is a saying that every good Swiss citizen has one in his or her pocket.

definition.zh_def: 口袋，通常縫在衣物上用來放置小物品的袋子。
definition.en_def: A small pouch sewn into or on clothing for carrying items.
definition.example: She found a coin in her pocket.
